args.natural_language_statement: Let z ∈ ℂ with |z| < 1. Prove that |log(1 - z)| ≤ ∑_{n=1}^∞ |z|^n / n ≤ |z| / (1 - |z|). End by translating to Lean4 code using Mathlib and ending with := by sorry.

result:
{"ok": true, "lean_translation": "import Mathlib
open intervalIntegral in
open intervalIntegral in
open Filter Asymptotics in

/-- Let z ∈ ℂ with |z| < 1. Prove that |log(1 - z)| ≤ ∑_{n=1}^∞ |z|^n / n ≤ |z| / (1 - |z|). End by translating to Lean4 code using Mathlib and ending with := by sorry. -/
lemma abs_log_one_sub_le_tac_7326 (z : ℂ) (hz : ‖z‖ < 1) : ‖Complex.log (1 - z)‖ ≤ ∑' (n : ℕ), ‖z‖ ^ n / ↑n ∧ ∑' (n : ℕ), ‖z‖ ^ n / ↑n ≤ ‖z‖ / (1 - ‖z‖) := sorry"}

args.content:
import Mathlib
open intervalIntegral in
open intervalIntegral in

/-- Let z ∈ ℂ with |z| < 1. Prove that |log(1 - z)| ≤ ∑_{n=1}^∞ |z|^n / n ≤ |z| / (1 - |z|). End by translating to Lean4 code using Mathlib and ending with := by sorry. -/
lemma abs_log_one_sub_le_tac_7326 (z : ℂ) (hz : ‖z‖ < 1) : ‖Complex.log (1 - z)‖ ≤ ∑' (n : ℕ), ‖z‖ ^ n / ↑n ∧ ∑' (n : ℕ), ‖z‖ ^ n / ↑n ≤ ‖z‖ / (1 - ‖z‖) := by sorry
